events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but it does not fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing issues with the purchased jacket.
The case has been assigned to customer support specialist Sarah M. to handle the refund process.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for the jacket you purchased due to fit issues. Iâ€™d be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 789456123. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging.
Thank you for the info. We will send you a prepaid return label to send the jacket back. Once received, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great. I appreciate the quick handling of my refund request and the prepaid shipping option.
We have issued the prepaid return label via email. Please ship the jacket at your earliest convenience and we will finalize the refund promptly.
This is a follow-up to confirm that your returned item was received and that the refund has been processed successfully to your original payment method.
The refund case for your jacket has now been closed. If you need further assistance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us.
